description:
In the Garden City, New York, area, a serious injury calls for the experienced personal injury lawyers of Sakkas, Cahn & Weiss, LLP. Our law firm's attorneys have more than 60 years of combined experience helping people secure the medical care and financial support they need after a serious accident has left them injured. Over those decades, our lawyers have secured nearly $500 million in compensation.

We know that the most important thing we can do for those who have been seriously injured in an accident is to help them secure the compensation that can facilitate their recovery and help make up for the pain and challenges they have had to face. Proper compensation can be the key to accessing the medical care that is needed as well as helping people face mounting medical bills and the impact of lost wages.

We provide our clients with exceptional personal injury representation that always places them first. We know that the best way to build a strong case is to learn exactly how our clients' injuries have impacted their lives. We focus on helping our clients recover the tools they will need to put their lives together after a serious accident has caused so much damage.

We are committed to providing our clients with the exceptional representation they need. To schedule a free initial consultation with one of the Garden City personal injury attorneys of Sakkas, Cahn & Weiss, LLP, call 212-571-7171.
